alert.note: Alert for Eastern Mackinac; Mackinac Island, Bois Blanc Island (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued November 19 at 9:56AM EST until November 19 at 1:00PM EST by NWS Gaylord
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1 PM EST THIS AFTERNOON... ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 1 PM THIS AFTERNOON TO 7 AM EST SUNDAY... * WHAT...Heavy lake effect snow and blowing snow. Additional snow accumulations of 4 to 8 inches. Winds gusting as high as 35 mph. * WHERE...Eastern Mackinac and Mackinac Island/Bois Blanc Island Counties. * WHEN...For the Winter Storm Warning, until 1 PM EST this afternoon. For the Winter Weather Advisory, from 1 PM this afternoon to 7 AM EST Sunday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. Slow down and use caution while traveling.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Mackinac; Mackinac Island, Bois Blanc Island
